main_definition: Refers to something happening or changing within a short period, typically during the night.

meanings_and_examples.example: The new CEO was appointed overnight by the board of directors.
I returned home and found out that my lost cat had come back overnight.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To stay somewhere for a short period, usually the night
meanings_and_examples.example: We decided to book an overnight stay at a hotel while on our road trip.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A sudden and unexpected improvement or success
meanings_and_examples.example: The company's financial situation improved overnight after receiving investor funding.
